short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CashEncode ClickBank Stats Chrome Extension for Vendors and Affiliates!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CashEncode ClickBank Stats extension monitors your ClickBank account stats as a vendor or an affiliate, displays a counter icon badge for your transactions of a preset period of time with details view, search and export capabilities and notifications for new transactions!
